formatted_address: 80 Marine Parade Road, #B1-85 to 87, B1-112 to 146 Parkway Parade, &, Singapore 449269
name: Flint Specialty Grill & Bar

reviews.text:
The newly renovated food court is really crowded!  I snagged a seat in front of Flint, so I figured I'd check it out.

First, I got the ribeye with red wine sauce.  The steak was incredible (for a hawker outlet); it was delicious on its own, but the sauce really took it up a notch.

Then I tried the smoked duck with pesto pasta. That pesto was so fresh-tasting, especially the basil.

Since I was loving it, I ordered the grilled chicken chop with brown sauce.  It didn't disappoint.

They use black pepper in everything, which gives it a nice kick.  It was a really great and satisfying meal.
Nice and tender striploin. $16.90 + $1 to change potato salad to aglio olio, and a 10% discount for paying with fairprice app. Totally worth the price point.

Chicken chop is way too thin, please fix portion sizes! Wasnâ€™t worth it for me even at $8.90 (promo) due to how thin the chop was.

Potato salad was good and the cook on the meat was good too, will try again after some time
Amazing food at a great price!  Had the ribeye steak with aglio olio and it was some of the best I've had.  It is even better than some expensive steakhouses I've been to!
Bad services waited 30 mins still say making until I when to ask second time than they found out Oder miss out. Total waited 45mins.
